articles.title: Afghanistan's earthquake has left this girl with nothing. Can the West help her without funding the Taliban? - ABC News
articles.description: A magnitude-6.1 earthquake in remote Afghanistan exacerbates a tricky ethical dilemma for Australia and other like-minded nations: How can they help Afghan people dealing with yet another unimaginable situation without supporting the Taliban directly?
articles.content:
